prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The Book language is a human-understandable markup language for writing AI applications such as chatbots, knowledge bases, agents, avatars, translators, and automations. It is based on markdown and designed to be easily readable and writable without requiring specific technical knowledge.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Book language, markup language, AI applications, chatbots, knowledge bases, agents, avatars, translators, automations, markdown, human-understandable, readable, writable, technical knowledge
